canvas_sdk.methods.enrollment_terms module¶

canvas_sdk.methods.enrollment_terms.list_enrollment_terms(request_ctx, account_id, workflow_state=None, per_page=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

Return all of the terms in the account. Account must be a root account and requires permission to manage the account (when called on non-root accounts, will be directed to the appropriate root account).

param request_ctx:
 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext
param account_id:
 (required) ID
type account_id:
 string
param workflow_state:
 (optional) no description
type workflow_state:
 string or None
param per_page:(optional) Set how many results canvas should return, defaults to config.LIMIT_PER_PAGE
type per_page:integer or None
return:List enrollment terms
rtype:requests.Response (with array data)
